# The `DWARFAcceleratorTable` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The accelerator tables are designed to allow efficient random access (using a symbol name as a key) into debug info by providing an index of the debug info DIEs. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::DWARFAcceleratorTable</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

The accelerator tables are designed to allow efficient random access (using a symbol name as a key) into debug info by providing an index of the debug info DIEs.

This class implements the common functionality of Apple and DWARF 5 accelerator tables. TODO: Generalize the rest of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/appleacceleratortable">AppleAcceleratorTable</a> interface and move it to this class.

Definition at line 32 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfacceleratortable-h">DWARFAcceleratorTable.h</a>.
